tag_list: internet, mobile, social-games, virtual-goods, business-developemnt, marketing, communication, latam
overview: Professional with 10 years of specialized experience in Communication and Business Development for Web and interactive media, plus extensive knowledge about the Latin American Mobile Market. Serving as General Manager of PlayPhone Latin America, Renato is responsible for managing the business strategy and operations from the Brazilian office. Previously, he served at PlayPhone Brazil as VP of Business Development and Marketing for Latin America where he was responsible for partnerships, marketing strategies and commercial initiatives.
